name: Pablo's "Super Mario Bros" Movie Quiz | Movies | 5 Questions

questions.explanation:
Princess Daisy.

	Princess Daisy is Luigi's girlfriend. (Princess Peach is Mario's girlfriend in the video game.)

questions.text: What color is Yoshi in the movie?
questions.explanation:
brownish-yellow.

	Yoshi in the movie looks a lot different from Yoshi in the video game. He looks like a raptor in the movie. He looks like an alligator turtle in the video game.

questions.text: Who is the second person to try to steal the meteor rock?
options: the old lady with the white gun
questions.explanation:
Big Bertha.

	Everybody is trying to steal the rock because if they give the rock to Koopa, he will pay for it in gold Koopa coins.

questions.text: Yes or No: Is Chomper in the movie?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Chomper is in the video game. He is a bad guy (my brother has gotten past him).

questions.text: Are Mario and Luigi wearing the same clothes in the movie that they wear in the video game?
questions.explanation:
No.

	I thought the clothes in the video game were cooler because they had Ms and Ls on them. Thanks for taking my quiz!
